title: About
text:
Visualizations help make complex data more understandable and accessible…
My LinkedIn
My GitHub



Bad graphs often distort or confuse the message (like the spiral COVID graph).
Good graphs are clear, accurate, and help in understanding the data (faceted lines, stacked charts, etc.).



We enhanced two bad graphs into clear and informative visuals…
